Title: Black Home
Writer: Ashish Deo (dialogue), Ashish Deo (screenplay), Ashish Deo (story)
Actors: Ashutosh Rana, Chitrashi Rawat, Murli Sharma, Simran Sehmi
Plot: Rajawadi Remand Home is in lot of controversy because of many illegal activities. DK, a news channel bureau chief wants to bring the facts out but the system is not so easy to expose.
